name: Firearms and ammunition
description: Firearms or ammunition unless accompanied by a permit issued by the Commissioner of Police
requirements: Must be accompanied by a permit issued by the Commissioner of Police

name: Explosives
description: Explosives, other than gunpowder or blasting powder
requirements: Requires permit. Note: gunpowder and blasting powder are exempt from this restriction

name: Caravans and houseboats
description: Caravans and houseboats not including house cruisers
requirements: Import restriction applies. House cruisers are exempt from this restriction

name: Motorcycles exceeding 150cc
description: Motor cycles exceeding 150 cc and their parts
requirements: Import restriction applies to motorcycles with engine capacity exceeding 150cc and parts thereof

name: Restricted plants
description: All plants the importation of which is restricted under the Plant Protection Act (Cap. 93), and any subsidiary legislation made under that Act
requirements: Requires phytosanitary certificate or import permit as specified under the Plant Protection Act
